content.query:
--create a database
create database analyticDB

--collate used to encode the string values to UTF8
collate Latin1_General_100_Bin2_UTF8

use analyticDB
GO

--Creation of master key
create master key encryption by password = 'Raju@321'

--Creating a Scoped Credential
create database scoped credential ManagedIdentity
with IDENTITY = 'Managed Identity'

--creation of Datasource
create external data source datalakesource
WITH(
    LOCATION = 'https://dbdatalakestore2.blob.core.windows.net/',
    CREDENTIAL = ManagedIdentity
)
